document_data.mainbody:
Lantana Duskeyes was a resistance fighter inhabiting the city of Kzelter in the Lake of Steam region during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Lantanas father was an adventurer who died fighting the Banite incursion into the region. Since her fathers death, she devoted her life to running an underground resistance to the Banites in and around Kzelter. Many followers who she recruited lost family members to the Banites. Since most of Lantanas group consisted of farmers, the success of their activity was limited mostly to supply raids and occasionly setting fire to Banite solider tents.
